object.name: editForumTopic
object.description: Use this method to edit name and icon of a topic in a forum supergroup chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have can_manage_topics administrator rights, unless it is the creator of the topic. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit name and icon of a topic in a forum supergroup chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have can_manage_topics administrator rights, unless it is the creator of the topic. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit name and icon of a topic in a forum supergroup chat. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have *can_manage_topics* administrator rights, unless it is the creator of the topic. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread of the forum topic
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread of the forum topic
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread of the forum topic
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: New topic name, 0-128 characters. If not specified or empty, the current name of the topic will be kept
annotations.html_description: New topic name, 0-128 characters. If not specified or empty, the current name of the topic will be kept
annotations.rst_description: New topic name, 0-128 characters. If not specified or empty, the current name of the topic will be kept
annotations.name: name

annotations.description: New unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon. Use getForumTopicIconStickers to get all allowed custom emoji identifiers. Pass an empty string to remove the icon. If not specified, the current icon will be kept
annotations.html_description: New unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon. Use getForumTopicIconStickers to get all allowed custom emoji identifiers. Pass an empty string to remove the icon. If not specified, the current icon will be kept
annotations.rst_description: New unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon. Use :class:`aiogram.methods.get_forum_topic_icon_stickers.GetForumTopicIconStickers` to get all allowed custom emoji identifiers. Pass an empty string to remove the icon. If not specified, the current icon will be kept
annotations.name: icon_custom_emoji_id
